verbose_text: Addition of an H2-receptor antagonist (H2RA) at bedtime to a high-dose PPI is likely to improve the nocturnal gastric pH control and decrease nocturnal gastric acid breakthrough [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: H2-receptor antagonist (H2RA) at bedtime to a high-dose PPI is likely to improve the nocturnal gastric pH control and decrease nocturnal gastric acid
